org.diylc.core
Interface IDIYComponent<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of component values, e.g. Resistance for resistors or String for transistors.
All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComponent, AbstractCurvedComponent, AbstractLeadedComponent, AbstractRadialComponent, AbstractSchematicLeadedSymbol, AbstractTransparentComponent
public interface IDIYComponent<T>
extends java.io.Serializable

Interface for component instance. Implementation classes of this interface will be instantiated by the application when component is added to the canvas.

Implementing classes should meet the following:

  • Must have an empty constructor.
  • Class should be annotated with ComponentDescriptor.
  • Getters for properties editable by users should be annotated with EditableProperty.
  • Component configuration should be stored int public static fields so they can be set through config file.

Author:
Branislav Stojkovic

getControlPointCount

int getControlPointCount()
Returns:
number of control points for this component instance. May vary between two instances of the same type, e.g. DIL IC with 8 and 16 pins will have 8 or 16 pins although they are of the same type.

isControlPointSticky

boolean isControlPointSticky(int index)
Parameters:
index -
Returns:
true, if the specified control point may stick to control points of other components.

canControlPointOverlap

boolean canControlPointOverlap(int index)
Parameters:
index -
Returns:
true, if the specified control point may overlap with other control points of the same component. The other control point must be able to overlap too.
